biography_text: BRINDISI, Anthony, a Representative from New York; born in Utica, Oneida County, N.Y., November 22, 1978; graduated from Notre Dame High School, Utica, N.Y., 1996; B.A., Siena College, Londonville, N.Y., 2000; J.D., Albany Law School of Union University, Albany, N.Y., 2004; lawyer, private practice; member, Utica school board, 2009-2012; member, New York state assembly, 2012-2018; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: Albany Law School of Union University, Albany, N.Y.
